snippet.title: Takedown Legends - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
TAKEDOWN LEGENDS is a fun, fast-paced top-down magical battle royale, where the player’s main objective is to explore the combat arenas to collect supplies, weapons and battle to be the last one standing. 

Fight, explore and create the best strategy to survive epic battles with up to 40 players. Play solo or invite friends and live epic experiences within the battle arenas of the Takedown Legends universe.

Find your squad and compete for exclusive rewards. New seasons bring new skins, more game modes, and more ways to have fun.

Socials

X: https://twitter.com/takedownlegends
Instagram: https://instagram.com/takedownlegends
Discord: https://discord.gg/DC5tUYD6
